DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : AUTOS
DOC.TEXT: Ford to Add 900 Jobs at Michigan Truck Plant : The auto_maker said it will add a third production crew at its truck plant in Wayne , Mich. , in February , a move that will create about 900 new assembly jobs . Ford said the third crew will allow the plant to produce an additional 32 # 000 F-Series full-size pickup_trucks and Ford Bronco sport-utility vehicles a year , bringing the plant ' s annual output to 240 # 000 vehicles .
